interpretation:
Opener has 15-17 points and a balanced hand
Opener may have a 5 card suit

hints.hint0:
Try to find an 8 card fit
Can use Stayman and Jacoby Transfers
hints.hint1:
Jacoby requires 5 of suit. Asks opener to bid next higher suit
Stayman asks opener to bid best 4 card major
hints.hint2:
0, 5+W (exc C): 2W (Jacoby Transfer)
0-7, <=4Ma: Pass
8-9, no 4Ma: 2NT
8+, 4+Ma: 2C (Stayman)
8+, 6+ Mi: 3NT
10+, 5+W: 3W
10-15, 6+Ma: 4Ma
No 4 card major
	10-15: 3NT
	16-17: 4NT
	18-19: 6NT
	20-21: 5NT
